summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GymTrack system - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes in DialogContent components

passed_tests: Admin login with correct credentials (admin@gymtrack.com / admin123)
Dashboard statistics display (alunos, instrutores, agendas, treinos counts)
Complete CRUD operations for Alunos with age validation (minimum 7 years)
Complete CRUD operations for Instrutores with age validation (minimum 18 years)
Complete CRUD operations for Agendas with time validation (end > start)
Complete CRUD operations for Treinos (both Simples and Personalizado types)
Email uniqueness validation for Alunos and Instrutores
Search functionality in Alunos and Treinos pages
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Alunos, Instrutores, Agendas, Treinos)
JWT token authentication for all protected endpoints
Proper error handling and user feedback with toast notifications
Responsive UI with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Relationship management (Agendas linked to Instrutores, Treinos linked to Alunos and Agendas)
